forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 12C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 53F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 12C. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 54F. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
